participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Organized and practical, enjoys planning and saving money.
participant_1.background: I like to keep my stockpile organised. I am a couponer. I love to save money. I donate any overstock to charity. I shop several times a week.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and free-spirited, has a love for nature and family.
participant_2.background: I love the water, any water, ocean, river, or lake. I moved out when I was 14. I like cartoons more than movies. I like to listen to someone else reading a book. My mother met Elvis.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2. It's nice to meet you.
You too! What are some of your interests?
I love the water, any water, ocean, river, or lake. I also like cartoons more than movies.
That's cool! I like to swim and go fishing. I also like to watch cartoons sometimes.
Me too! I love swimming and fishing. I don't get to do it as much as I'd like to, though.
I know what you mean. I live in a landlocked state, so I have to go to the beach or a lake to swim.
That's too bad. I live in a coastal state, so I'm always close to water.
Lucky! I wish I lived closer to the ocean.
I could take you swimming sometime.
That would be fun!
My mom also met Elvis.
Really? That's amazing! What was she like?
She's a really cool lady. She's been married five times and has eight kids.
Wow! That's a lot of family.
Yeah, it is. But we're all really close.
That's nice. I have two sisters, but I'm not very close to them.
It's always nice to have a close family.
Yeah, it is. I'm glad I met you.
Me too! It was nice talking to you.
